text: Bullia mirepicta is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusc in the family Nassariidae, the Nassa mud snails or dog whelks. ==Description== ==Distribution== This marine species occurs off Madagascar. ==References== * Bozzetti, L., 2007. Bullia mirepicta (Gastropoda: Hypsogastropoda) nuova specie dal Madagascar meridionale. Malacologia Mostra Mondiale 57: 14-15 Category:Nassariidae Category:Gastropods described in 2007
title: Bullia mirepicta
